src_text: Ukukhishwa komgomo weSifo segciwane le-Corona (i-COVID-19)

src_text: IKhabhinethi iphinde yakuqinisekisa ukuqaliswa kweSigaba Sesibili sohlelo Lokugoma ngoMsombuluko, mhla ziyi-17 kuNhlaba 2021.
trg_text: Cabinet has reconfirmed the commencement of Phase 2 of Vaccine Roll-Out programme on Monday, 17 May 2021.

src_text: Lesi sigaba sizoqala ngokugonywa kwabantu abaneminyaka yobudala engama-60 nangaphezulu futhi iminyango Yezempilo kuzwelonke nasezifundazweni izosabalalisa ulwazi mayelana nendawo yezikhungo zokugoma ezingaphezu kwezinkulungwane ezintathu (izi-3000).
trg_text: This phase will commence with the vaccination of persons 60 years of age and older and the national and provincial departments of Health will communicate the information about the location of more than three thousand (3000) the vaccination centre

src_text: Ukuqaliswa kweSigaba Sesibili kuzoqhubeka kanyekanye nokugonywa okuqhubekayo kwabasebenzi bezempilo (ama-HCW) ukugonywa kwabo okwaphazanyiswa izinkinga zokulawuleka zomgomo we-Johnson & Johnson e-USA nase-Europ Uhlelo lokugoma lweSisonke olunwetshelwe ezikhungweni ezingama-95 ezweni lonkana kuze kube manje selugome abasebenzi bezempilo (ama-HCW) abayizi-434 980 futhi luzophela mhla ziyi-14 kuNhlaba 2021.
trg_text: The Sisonke vaccination plan which was expanded to 95 sites across the country has vaccinated to date 434,980 healthcare workers (HCWs) and will end on the 14 May 2021.

src_text: IKhabhinethi iyathokoza ukuthi abasebenzi bezempilo abasele bazogonywa ngomgomo wakwa-Pfizer kuze kube khona esinye isazis

trg_text: You do not need data or airtime to access the zero-rated SMS and WhatsApp registration service Those who encounter challenges whilst registering can call the COVID-19 hotline: 0800 029 995.

src_text: IKhabhinethi lethulelwa umbiko ngesimo esihlobene nokusuleleka nge-COVID-19 esibheduke e-India futhi liyaseseka isinqumo sokunikela ngemishini yokuphefumula e-India njengengxenye yokuzinikela kweNingizimu Afrika ukuthi impi ebhekene ne-COVID-19 emhlabeni wonkana idinga ubambiswan
trg_text: Cabinet was briefed on the prevailing situation relating to Covid-19 infections in India and supported the decision to donate ventilators to India as part of South Africa s commitment that the fight against Covid-19 across the globe requires collective effor Cabinet is also aware of the concerns amongst South Africans about the Covid-19 situation in India, and wish to assure South Africans that the Department of Health and our scientist continue to monitor developments in that country and that necessary and appropriate precautions and protocols are implemented to protect South African

src_text: IKhabhinethi futhi iyazi ngokukhathazeka okukhona phakathi kwabantu baseNingizimu Afrika ngesimo se-COVID-19 sase-India, futhi ifisa ukuqinisekisa abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi uMnyango Wezempilo kanye nososayensi bethu bayaqhubeka nokuqapha okwenzakalayo kuleliya lizwe nokuthi ukuqaphela okudingekayo nokufanele kanye nemithethomgomo iyabekwa ukuze kuvikelwe abantu baseNingizimu Afrik
trg_text: International Nurses Day (12 May) Cabinet noted that its meeting was taking place on the day the world marked International Nurses Day and reiterated its message of gratitude to the nurses in South Africa, the continent of Africa and the world for their selflessness and dedication in the face of the deadly COVID-19 pandemi Nurses, together with other health workers, continue to be at the frontline in the fight against COVID-19 at personal risk to their own lives and risk of exposure to their familie Government remain indebted to the resilience, sacrifice and tenacity of South Africa s nurses in the fight against COVID-19.

src_text: Ngaphezu kwalokhu, iKhabhinethi yabikelwa ngokukhula kancane kwezigameko zokusuleleka nge-COVID-19 kuleli lizwe kanye nokubekwa kwezinyathelo ezidingekayo ukunciphisa ukubhebhethek
trg_text: In addition, Cabinet was briefed about the slight increase in COVID-19 infections in the country and the application of necessary response measures to curb the sprea

src_text: IKhabhinethi ikhumbuza bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi baqhubeke nokulandela izindlela okungezona ezemithi yokwelapha ukuvikela ukubhebhetheka kwe-COVID-19 okungukuqhubeka nokugqoka izifonyo phakathi kwabantu; ukuqhelelana ngegebe okungenani eliyimitha nesigamu; ukuhlanza izandla njalo ngamanzi nensipho noma ukusebenzisa isibulali-magciwane esine-alcohol engama-70%; kanye nokugwema ukuvakasha okungenasidingo bese uhlala ekhaya

trg_text: Trade Related Aspects of Intellectual Property (IP) Rights (TRIPS) waiver on COVID-19 vaccines Cabinet welcomed the support of the United States for the WTO to

src_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamukele ukwesekelwa yi-United States ngokuthi i-WTO ibeke i-TRIPS emigomweni ye-COVID-19.
trg_text: Cabinet approved the extension of the National State of Disaster on COVID-19 until 15 June 2021.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika kanye ne-India bebelokhu behola umzamo weNhlangano Yomhlaba Yezokuhweba (i-WTO) ukuthi kubekwe i-TRIP Ukubekwa kwe-TRIPS kuzovumela ukufinyeleleka kubuchwepheshe obuzonikeza umfutho ekukhiqizweni okubanzi kwemigomo ye-COVID-19.
trg_text: South Africa and India have been leading the initiative at the World Trade Organization (WTO) for the waiver of TRIP The waiver of TRIPS will enable access to technologies that will give impetus to the wider manufacturing of Covid-19 vaccine The move has seen more than 100 countries, including China, supporting the effort to apply waivers to parts of the WTO s TRIP Poor access to COVID-19 have prevented majority of developing countries in particular within the African continent to make significant progress in the fight against COVID-19.

src_text: Lesi senzo sesenze sabona amazwe angaphezu kwayi-100, kubandakanya i-China, esekela umzamo wokuyekela ezingxenyeni ze-TRIPS ye-WT
trg_text: The amendments clarify some of the definitions in the Act and add additional offences, particularly on people who depart, in transit or arrive in any country for the purpose of joining or supporting terrorist group It prohibits publications with terrorist-related conten The amendments also respond to the gaps that where highlighted by the UN Counter Terrorism Executive Directorate Agricultural Product Standards Amendment Bill

trg_text: Firearms Amendment Bill of 2021 Cabinet approved the publication of the Firearms Amendment Bill of 2021 for public commen The Bill proposes tighter controls and management of firearms and the establishment of the National Firearms Registe The changes will assist in reducing the number of firearms in private hands and consequently reduce incidents of violent crime The Bill also improves the processing, control of firearms and the application syste 2.

src_text: Izwe lase-Palestine
trg_text: Rome Declaration

src_text: IKhabhinethi ikugxeka kakhulu ukuhlaselwa kwababhikishi base-Palestine e-Al Aqsa Mosque kanye nase-Dome on the Rock kanye nokukhishwa ngokungemthetho kwabantu base-Palestine emakhaya abo e-Sheikh al Jarrah aphumela eMpumalanga ye-Jerusalema ukwenzela indawo yokuhlala abantu bama-Israel Izenzo zabantu bama-Israeli zingukuphula umthetho ngokugcwele komthetho wamazwe ngamazwe, futhi kungukushaya indiva Izinqumo Zomkhandlu Wezokuphepha Zomhlabuhlangene, (i-UNSC) kubandakanya Izinqumo zama-446 (zangowe-1979) kanye nezezi-2334 (zangowezi-2016)
trg_text: PalestineCabinet strongly condemned the attacks on Palestinian protesters at Al Aqsa Mosque and the Dome on the Rock and the unlawful evictions of Palestinians from their homes in the Sheikh al Jarrah in the annexed East Jerusalem to make way for Israeli settlement Israel's actions are in stark violation of international law, and a total disregard of the United Nations Security Council Resolutions, (UNSC) including Resolutions 446 (1979) and 2334 (2016) which explicitly call for an end to Israeli occupation and the fulfilment of the rights of the Palestinian people, including to self-determination and independencCabinet calls on Israel to

src_text: ezibeka ngokusobala ukuqedwa kokuhlala kwabantu bama-Israeli kanye nokugcwaliseka kwamalungelo abantu base-Palestine, kubandakanya nokuzithathela izinqumo nokuzimel
trg_text: stop the barbaric attacks on Palestinians and commit itself to international efforts aimed at reviving a political process, leading to the establishment of a viable Palestinian state, existing side by side in peace with Israel within internationally recognised borders, based on those existing on 4 June 1967, with East Jerusalem as the capital Palestin 8.

src_text: IKhabhinethi icela izwe lakwa-Israel ukuthi liyeke ukuhlasela okungubulwane kubantu base-Palestine futhi lizinikele lona emizamweni yamazwe ngamazwe okuhloswe ngayo ukuvuselela ipolitiki, okuzoholela ekusungulweni kombuso wase-Palestine ophilayo, uxolo macala onke nezwe lakwa-Israel phakathi kwemingcele eyaziwayo emhlabeni, okuyilezo ezazikhona mhla we-4 kuNhlangulana 1967, neMpumalanga Jerusalema njengenhloko-dolobha yase-Palestin
trg_text: Cabinet resolved at its meeting of 12 May 20201 that a financial recovery plan be imposed, the Council of Lekwa LM be dissolved and an Administrator be appointed in terms of section 139(5)(a) and (b) of the Constitution, read together with section 146(3)(a) of the MFM Cabinet further supported the dissolution of the Municipal Council of the Lekwa municipalit The Ministers of Finance and Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs will in due course announce institutional arrangements that will be implemented to stabilise the municipality and ensure the return to service deliver Bills1.

src_text: Uxhasomali lwenkampani i-ACWA Power lweSiphehlimandla i-Redstone 1
trg_text: Dr Kgosientso David Ramokgopa as Head: Infrastructure South Africa in the DPW Enquiries:Ms Phumla Williams

src_text: IKhabhinethi lamukele isimemezelo sokuthi inkampani i-ACWA Power isithole uxhasomali oluyizigidigidi eziyi-1zamarandi lwesiphehlimandla i-Redstone esiseNyakatho Kap Lesi siphehlimandla siyingxenye yemisebenzi yengqalasizinda emikhulu yaseNingizimu Afrika futhi singesikhulu kakhulu kwezotshalomali lwezamandla ezweni lakith 1
trg_text: ACWA Power securing funding for the Redstone Concentrated Solar Power Plant 1Cabinet welcomed the announcement that ACWA Power has secured the R1billion funding for the Redstone Concentrated Solar Power Plant in Northern Cap This plant is part of South Africa s major infrastructure projects and the largest renewable energy investment in our countr 1Redstone plant is set to produce 100 Megawatts W of renewal energy that is expected to be delivered at the end of 2023 and it will reliably deliver a stable electricity supply to more than 200 000 household Cabinet decisions 1.

src_text: Isiphehlimandla i-Redstone sesilungele ukukhiqiza ugesi ongama-100 megawatts okulindeleke ukuthi uhanjiswe ngokuphela kowezi-2023 futhi uzothumela uzinzo ekuhanjisweni kogesi emakhaya angaphezu kwezi-200 000.

trg_text: National Commemorative Programme for the 25th Anniversary of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996 This year marks exactly 25 years since South Africa adopted its Constitution on 8 May 1996, a Constitution that is still hailed amongst the best in the worl

src_text: Ngalokhu-ke, iKhabhinethi igunyaze uHlelo Lwesikhumbuzo Sikazwelonke lonyaka wonke Lokugujwa Kweminyaka engama-25 yoMthethosisekelo waseRiphabhlikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika ukuqaliswa kwawo okuzoholwa nguMnyango Wezobulungiswa Nokuthuthukiswa koMthethosisekel 2.
trg_text: In this regard, Cabinet approved the year-long National Commemorative Programme for the 25th Anniversary of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996 which implementation will be led by the Department of Justice and Constitutional Developmen 2.

src_text: Ingqungquthela Yesihlanu Yongqongqoshe ngoKuqedwa Kokusetshenziswa Kwezingane
trg_text: The 5th Ministerial Global Conference on the Eradication of Child Labour Cabinet approved that South Africa hosts the 5th International Conference on the Eradication of Child Labour from 2 to 4 May 2022.

src_text: IKhabhinethi likwamukele ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika isingathe Ingqungquthela Yamazwe Ngamazwe Yesihlanu Ngokuqedwa Kokusetshenziswa Kwezingane kusuka mhla we-2 kuya mhla we-4 kuNhlaba 2022.
trg_text: Africa Day South Africa will join the rest of the continent to mark Africa Day on Tuesday, 25 May 2021.

src_text: Ingqungquthela ibanjwa njalo eminyakeni emithathu ngaphansi kobuholi beNhlangano Yomhlaba Yemisebenz Ngenxa yobhubhane lwe-COVID-19, yahlehliswa ngowezi-2021 ukuya kowezi-2022.
trg_text: The conference is convened every three years under the leadership of the International Labour Organisatio Owing to the COVID-19 pandemic, it was postponed from 2021 to 2022.

src_text: Ingqungquthela izoqondiswa emizamweni yomhlaba yokuqeda inkinga yokusetshenziswa kwezingan Amalungu emibuso azothola ithuba lokubuyekeza izingenelelo zawo zokuqeda ukusetshenziswa kwezingane emazweni aw INingizimu Afrika inoHlelomsebenzi Olumayelana Nokusetshenziswa Kwezingane, oluzohlinzeka ngomhlahlandlela wezwe ekuqedeni ukusetshenziswa kwezingan 3.
trg_text: The conference will deliberate on the global efforts to eradicate the problem of child labou Member states will get an opportunity to reflect on their respective interventions to stop child labour in their countrie South Africa has a Child Labour Programme of Action, which provides the country s roadmap towards eliminating child labou 3.

trg_text: Social facilitation process for the implementation of infrastructure projects Cabinet approved the proposed Social Facilitation methodology, mechanism and processes for implementing infrastructure projects, as presented by the Department of Public Works and Infrastructure (DPWI).

src_text: Le nqubo yokusebenza izoqinisekisa ukuthi kuxoxiswana nemiphakathi ngemisebenzi yokwakha emiphakathin

trg_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the Draft Upstream Petroleum Resources Development Bill to Parliamen The Bill provides the legislative and regulatory framework to create a conducive environment for investment, growth and job creation in the upstream of petroleum resources marke It also provides clarity on, amongst others, the application system; permits and rights issuing; transferability of the rights; participation by black persons; participation of the State; the transitional requirements and the strategic stock requirements for petroleum rights holders to sell a percentage of petroleum at prevailing market price to the State Petroleum Compan
